versos: (sake) John 12:30 - "Jesus said, 'This voice was for your sake, not mine.'";;;

(joash) 2 Kings 12:4 - "Then joash said to the priests, Collect all the money that is brought as sacred offerings to the temple of the Lordthe money collected in the census, the money received from personal vows and the money brought voluntarily to the temple.";;;
(coats) "And if any man will sue thee at the law, and take away thy coat, let him have thy cloke also." - Matthew 5:40;;;
(skins) Genesis 3:21: "The Lord God made garments of skin for Adam and his wife and clothed them.";;;
(clothed) Genesis 3:21 - "The Lord God made garments of skin for Adam and his wife and clothed them.";;;
(drove) Genesis 32:16 - He delivered them into the hands of his servants, every drove by itself, and said to his servants, "Pass on ahead of me and put a space between droves.";;;
(flaming) Psalm 104:4 - "He makes winds his messengers, flames of fire his servants.";;;
(cain) Genesis 4:1 - "Now Adam knew Eve his wife, and she conceived and bore cain, saying, 'I have gotten a man with the help of the Lord.'";;;
(abel) Genesis 4:2 - "Later she gave birth to his brother abel. abel became a shepherd, while Cain was a farmer.";;;
(sheep) Isaiah 53:6 - "We all, like sheep, have gone astray, each of us has turned to our own way; and the LORD has laid on him the iniquity of us all.";;;
(offering) Leviticus 1:4 - "He is to lay his hand on the head of the burnt offering, and it will be accepted on his behalf to make atonement for him.";;;
(flock) Psalm 23:1 - "The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.";;;
(ephron) Genesis 23:10 - "Now ephron was sitting among the Hittites, and ephron the Hittite answered Abraham in the hearing of the Hittites, of all who went in at the gate of his city.";;;
(fat) Isaiah 34:6 - The sword of the LORD is bathed in blood
(wroth) Psalm 78:31 - "The wrath of God came upon them, and slew the fattest of them, and smote down the chosen men of Israel.";;;
(seeketh) Matthew 7:7 - "Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.";;;
